DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Purpose There many physiologic change laparoscopic surgery . Increase intracerebral pressure ( ICP ) one , know associate arterial concentration carbon dioxide positional change . Changes ICP measure directly invasive method . However , optic nerve sheath diameter ( ONSD ) correlation ICP ultrasonographic measurement optic nerve sheath diameter ( ONSD ) know noninvasive rapidly applicable technique evaluate ICP . The aim study investigate change ONSD accord positional change laparoscopic surgery . 2 . Hypothesis Changes ONSD show accord positional change laparoscopic surgery , reflect change ICP . 3 . Objectives Female patient schedule undergo laparoscopic surgery , American society anesthesiologist class ( ASA ) I-II , age 19 65 year , allocate 2 group . - Group 1 : Laparoscopic gynecological surgery , ( Trendelenburg position ) - Group 2 : Laparoscopic cholecystectomy , ( Reverse trendelenburg position ) 4 . Methods Patients premedicated midazolam 0.5 mg/kg transport operating room . Once operating room , patient monitor electrocardiography , non invasive blood pressure , pulse oximetry ( Datex-Ohmeda S/5 , Planar Systems , Inc. , Beaverton , OR , USA ) BIS ( Aspect 2000 , Aspect Medical Systems , Inc. , Newton , MA , USA ) . Anesthesia induce propofol ( 2mg/kg ) follow administer rocuronium 0.6 mg/kg . After tracheal intubation , lungs patient ventilate oxygen air ( 1:2 ) use tidal volume 8-10 mL/kg respiratory rate 10-12/min , ventilation rate adjust maintain end-tidal carbon dioxide partial pressure 35 40 mmHg peak inspiratory pressure 30 cmH2O . Anesthesia maintain desflurane addition continuous infusion remifentanil . Radial arterial cannulation do invasive arterial blood pressure monitoring . After induction anesthesia , stabilization cardiovascular status achieve , optic nerve sheath diameter ( ONSD ) measure ultrasonographic measurement . Patients place supine position eye close , thick gel layer apply closed upper eyelid . The 7.5-MHz linear probe place gel without excessive pressure adjust proper angle display entry optic nerve globe . The intensity ultrasound adjust display optimal contrast retrobulbar echogenic fat tissue vertical hypoechoic band . An ultrasound beam focus retrobulbar area ( 4 cm deep ) use low possible acoustic power could measure ONSD . The ONSD measure 3 mm behind optic disc . Measurements perform transverse sagittal plane eye , final ONSD value calculate average 4 measured value . ONSD measure 7 serial time point surgery : 1 . Preinduction ( prior induction anesthesia operate room ) 2 . 5 minute induction anesthesia 3 . 5 minute introduce pneumoperitoneum 4 . 5 minute positional change 5 . 15 minute positional change 6 . 30 minute positional change 7 . 5 minute discontinue pneumoperitoneum Arterial blood gas analysis perform evaluate arterial carbon dioxide concentration ( PaCO2 ) level time point . 5 . Statistical Analysis All data express number ( % ) mean Â± standard deviation . Repeated measure ANOVA perform compare parameter specific time point surgery .
